flawed_nl_solution:
Casey can hula hoop 3 minutes less than Nancy so she can hula hoop for 10-3 = <<10-3=7>>7 minutes
Morgan can hula hoop three times as long as Casey, who can hula hoop for 7 minutes, so she can hula hoop for 3*7 = <<3*7=12>>12 minutes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
